content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) with 49 iron ore and 0 coal, currently full (50/50 items)
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) with 3 iron ore and 0 coal, currently has no ingredients to smelt
- Stone furnace (position 4.0, 0.0) with 0 iron ore and 0 coal, currently has no ingredients to smelt
- Stone furnace (position 6.0, 0.0) with 0 iron ore and 0 coal, currently has no ingredients to smelt

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure the furnace has available space in its inventory before attempting to insert items. The error indicates that the furnace at position (0, 0) is full and cannot accept more coal.
- Check the current inventory of the furnace before inserting items to avoid attempting to insert into a full inventory.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
